00050 #include "TShape.h"
00051 
00052 class QLabel;
00053 
00054 class Flux : public Qwt3D::Function
00055 {
00056 public:
00057         Flux(Qwt3D::SurfacePlot& pw, PhotonMap* map, TShape* shape)
00058         :Function(pw), m_map(map), m_shape(shape)
00059         {
00060     
00061         }
00062 
00063         double operator()(double x, double y)
00064         {
00065                 int nearestPhotons = 100;
00066                 double res = 1.0 / 100.0;
00067                 Point3D point = m_shape->Sample(x*res,y*res);
00068                 std::cout << "x, y " << x <<", " << y << "  u,v " <<x*res << ", " << y*res << std::endl;
00069                 std::cout << "Point at " << point << " has a flux of " << m_map->fluxAtPoint( point, nearestPhotons ) << std::endl;
00070                 return m_map->fluxAtPoint( point, nearestPhotons );
00071         }
00072         
00073 private:
00074         double* m_data;
00075         PhotonMap* m_map;
00076         TShape* m_shape;
00077 };
00078
